remarks: Convergence of a sequence sandwiched between another converging sequence and its limit.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climadd.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climsqz.5 $e |- ( ph -> G e. W ) $.
climsqz.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climsqz.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climsqz.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( G ` k ) ) $.
climsqz.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) <_ A ) $.
climsqz $p |- ( ph -> G ~~> A ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
